DataElement.preferredName: Positive HCV Negative Hepatitis C RNA Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable response that asks if the patient has a positive HCV serology with no detectable HCV RNA.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hepatitis C Virus Positive Negative Finding Hepatitis C RNA Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Indicates that hepatitis C virus has been detected in a sample._A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition._A measurement of the Hepatitis C RNA in a biological specimen._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hepatitis C Virus Positive Negative Finding Hepatitis C RNA Measurement
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Indicates that hepatitis C virus has been detected in a sample.:A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.:A measurement of the Hepatitis C RNA in a biological specimen.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that hepatitis C virus has been detected in a sample.
A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.
A measurement of the Hepatitis C RNA in a biological specimen.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: CITN CRF: Cancer Immunotherapy Trials Network Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/11/20 jk Released per 4Q20 qtrly review; used on form.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has positive HCV serology but no detectable HCV RNA

ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has positive HCV serology but no detectable HCV RNA, indicative of spontaneously cleared HCV infection
